Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a fish in a water environment, such as a lake, river, pond, or ocean.
The student can label the fish and the water environment in their drawing.
The student can include and label resources the fish needs, such as water and plants or food in the environment.
The student can show and label other animals or plants that live in the same environment as the fish.
The student can illustrate and describe how the fish and the environment work together to meet each other's needs.
